description.narrative: The PDO for EDFC3 is to: (i) provide additional rail transport capacity, improved service quality and higher freight throughput on the Ludhiana - Khurja and Kanpur - Mughalsarai section of the Eastern Dedicated Freight Corridor; and (ii) develop Institutional capacity of DFCCIL to build maintain and operate the entire dedicated freight corridor network

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual work plan of proposed Linked Activities | Description :Bank to be furnished an annual work plan ofproposed linked activities to be implemented in the following fiscal year, which plan shall be carried out in compliance with thesafeguard documents. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Contractors compliance with Safeguard Documents | Description :DFCCIL to ensure that the contracts for civilworks include the obligation of the relevant contractor to comply with the relevant Safeguard documents applicable to such civilworks. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Final Impact Study | Description :DFCCIL to provide to the Bank a final impact study of the Project, conductedunder terms of reference satisfactory to the Bank. | Due Date :30-Nov-2021

Finance Agreement :Governmental Permits & Resettlement Measures/Compensation | Description :DFCCIL to ensure that for all civilworks: (i) the necessary governmental permits have been obtained, and any conditions attached thereto have been met/fulfilled; and(ii) all resettlement measures (including compensation, and/or relocation assistance to Displaced Persons have been carried out,prior to commencing the respective civil works. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Grievance Redressal Mechanism | Description :DFCCIL to maintain a two stage grievance redressal committee atdistrict level and headquarters, and an ombudsman to handle/process any complaints arising out of the implementation of the RPF andthe RAP. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Implementation Reviews of Safeguard Documents | Description :DFCCIL to undertake annual reviews and preparereports on the results obtained and experiences gained in the implementation of the RPF and the RAPs; and implement adjustments tothe RAPs and RPF as per the recommendations made by the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Ineligible Expenditures (negative list) | Description :DFCCIL shall ensure that the proceeds of the Loan are notutilized to finance land acquisition or to pay any compensation for resettlement and rehabilitation of displaced persons under theProject. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Linked Activities – Safeguards | Description :India to ensure that no civil works related to linked activitiescommence until and unless the activities have been screened pursuant to the RPF and the EMF, and any required EA(s), SIA(s),RAP(s), EMP(s) have been prepared, and reviewed and agreed with the Bank | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Mid-term review | Description :DFCCIL to carry out a comprehensive mid- term review of the progress achieved inthe implementation of the project. | Due Date :30 Nov 2018

Finance Agreement :Phase Plan for Signaling and Telecommunications Systems | Description :DFCCIL to agree: (i) with the respectivecontractor carrying out the railway track construction, on a phase plan for the installation of signaling, telecommunications andelectrical system; and (ii) with the respective authorities and/or relevant utilities, on an interconnection and/or utilitiesrelocation plan. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Procurement, contract, financial, social and environment management | Description :DFCCIL to maintain qualifiedstaff in adequate numbers to carry out the procurement, contract, financial, social and environment management and generaloversightmonitoring and reporting of the project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Documents | Description :DFCCIL to implement the project in accordance with the Project ImplementationManual, the Concession Agreement and the Track Access Agreement. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Management Consultant (PMC) | Description :DFCCIL to select and engage the services of a PMC in order toassist with contract management functions for the design-build contracts, and the general implementation of the project. |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Quality and Safety Audit Consultant (QSAC) & Social and Environmental safeguards | Description :DFCCIL to selectand engage the services of a QSAC and SESMRC in order to prepare quarterly monitoring reports on the implementation of the civilworks and compliance with the Safeguard Documents. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguard Documents | Description :DFCCIL to implement the Project in accordance with the Safeguard Documents(i.e. EMF, RPF, EAs, EMPs, SIA, and RAPs), and to refrain from unilaterally amending, suspending, voicing or waiving any provisionof said documents. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Social and Environmental Management Unit (SEMU) | Description :DFCCIL to maintain a social and environmentalmanagement unit with staff at headquarters and in the field offices with functions, powers staff and resources to implement thesocial and environmental safeguard measures required under the safeguard documents. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Track Access Regime | Description :DFCCIL to ensure that the track access regime is in place and operationalprior to commencement of commercial operations of the EDFC. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: Safeguards Rectification | No later than November 30, 2021, the Borrower shall complete the implementation ofallactions required under the Social Safeguards Rectification Plan for Kanpur-Mughalsarai and Khurja Dadri section,dated May 24,2021, in a manner satisfactory to the Bank
